issue.title: [CF 1036] Shroud of Con - timer
issue.body:
Sorry I didn't attach a string on the previous ticket. Below is the string for the icon which I am trying to track Shroud of Concealment and have it with a timer. Everything else I track with TMW, the timer works, but when I try and track Shroud of Concealment on myself (player), I am unable to get the timer working. ps - I am not the rogue, my 2's partner is the rogue so he pops it, and I go into it and the icon pops up, but no timer. Below is the string.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.6 ^SName^SShroud~`of~`Concealment;~`Agile ^SEnabled^B ^t^N72101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. have a rogue friend (in a party with you) pop Shroud of Concealment
2. you stand in the range of the Shroud of Concealment
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I get the icon to appear which is what I want, but I can't get the timer sweep to work. But the icon then disappears correctly once the Shroud dissipates

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
Forgot to check - I'm at work atm, I can provide this later. Sorry.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
string included above.

Included.

comments.body:
There is no timer because the buff, when it is on you, has no timer. Only the rogue's buff has a timer.

If you want to track it on anyone, track it on "party1-4;raid1-40", and set some unit conditions to restrict it to only rogues within 100 yards of you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
